data.productDisplayName: Puma Women Speeder White Sports Shoes

brandUserProfile.bio: PUMA is the World's Fastest Sports Brand
brandUserProfile.name: PUMA

materials_care_desc.value:
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
Do not store in direct sunlight
Click here for the perfect care products for synthetic sports shoes

description.value:
A low profile jogging sneaker, the puma Speeder lives up to its name, offering great speed and traction with maximum comfort and grip on various terrain. Simple and style but great to look at, these shoes team well with jeans and tees for casual occasions too.
